packages/artbeat_auth/lib/src/screens/re.text:
We use data to:
• Provide and improve ARTbeat features (profiles, artwork, events, ads, community).
• Process payments, subscriptions, and refunds.
• Enable GPS navigation and location-based discovery.
• Send notifications (reminders, purchases, account alerts).
• Moderate content and enforce policies.
• Provide analytics to artists, galleries, and advertisers.
• Ensure safety, prevent fraud, and comply with legal requirements.
packages/artbeat_auth/lib/src/screens/re.context:
content:                             'We use data to:
• Provide and improve ARTbeat features (profiles, artwork, events, ads, community).
• Process payments, subscriptions, and refunds.
• Enable GPS navigation and location-based discovery.
• Send notifications (reminders, purchases, account alerts).
• Moderate content and enforce policies.
• Provide analytics to artists, galleries, and advertisers.
• Ensure safety, prevent fraud, and comply with legal requirements.',                       ),                       _

packages/artbeat_auth/lib/src/screens/re.text:
We share your data only as needed:
• With Service Providers: Stripe (payments), Firebase (storage, authentication, analytics).
• With Other Users: Profile details, artwork, captures, events, ads, or comments you choose to make public.
• For Moderation/Legal Compliance: To comply with DMCA, law enforcement, or platform security.
• In Business Transfers: If ARTbeat undergoes a merger, acquisition, or asset sale.

We do not sell your personal information.
packages/artbeat_auth/lib/src/screens/re.context:
content:                             'We share your data only as needed:
• With Service Providers: Stripe (payments), Firebase (storage, authentication, analytics).
• With Other Users: Profile details, artwork, captures, events, ads, or comments you choose to make public.
• For Moderation/Legal Compliance: To comply with DMCA, law enforcement, or platform security.
• In Business Transfers: If ARTbeat undergoes a merger, acquisition, or asset sale.

We do not sell your personal information.',                       ),                       _

packages/artbeat_auth/lib/src/screens/re.text:
United States (CCPA/State Privacy Laws):
• Right to know what personal data we collect.
• Right to request deletion of your personal data.
• Right to opt out of sale of personal data (we do not sell data).

EU/EEA/UK (GDPR):
• Right of access, rectification, and erasure.
• Right to restrict or object to processing.
• Right to data portability.
• Right to withdraw consent at any time.
• Right to lodge a complaint with your local Data Protection Authority.

Other Regions:
• We honor local legal rights where applicable.

We accept all major credit cards and PayPal through our secure Stripe payment processing.
We may update this Privacy Policy. Updates will be posted with a new Effective Date, and we will notify users where legally required.

We share your data only as needed:
• With Service Providers: Stripe (payments), Firebase (storage, authentication, analytics).
• With Other Users: Profile details, artwork, captures, events, ads, or comments you choose to make public.
• For Moderation/Legal Compliance: To comply with DMCA, law enforcement, or platform security.
• In Business Transfers: If ARTbeat undergoes a merger, acquisition, or asset sale.

We do not sell your personal information.

We use data to:
• Provide and improve ARTbeat features (profiles, artwork, events, ads, community).
• Process payments, subscriptions, and refunds.
• Enable GPS navigation and location-based discovery.
• Send notifications (reminders, purchases, account alerts).
• Moderate content and enforce policies.
• Provide analytics to artists, galleries, and advertisers.
• Ensure safety, prevent fraud, and comply with legal requirements.
